trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: The shadow fey has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The shadow fey's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can cast the following spells innately, requiring no material components.
1/day: misty step (when in shadows, dim light, or darkness only)

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, the shadow fey has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Traveler in Darkness
text: The shadow fey has advantage on Intelligence (Arcana) checks made to know about shadow roads and shadow magic spells or items.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
